title: misc/emacs: type in comment highlights word on newline
body:
by **Matthew.Horsnell**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. editing code using emacs mode.
2. add a comment to code with the word "type" in it
3. next line first statement is highlighted

e.g. cut and paste http://play.golang.org/p/_OPTNaDtme into emacs with emacs go mode
enabled.

What is the expected output?
the comment shouldn't affect syntax highlighting on subsequent lines.

What do you see instead?
the next line has a statement highlighted

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
n/a

Which operating system are you using?
Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go 1.0.3

Please provide any additional information below.
